de.gnwi.spicesviewer

Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gnwi.spicesviewer.Constants

  • public abstract class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
    The non language-related constants for the Spices Viewer application.
    Author:
    Jonas Schaub

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Constants.AddStructureOptions
      An enum for the different modes of adding a structure from the library to the ViewerPanel's JTextArea that holds their language-dependent representations.
      static class  Constants.ImageExportOptions
      An enum for the four different modes of exporting the graph or the whole main frame that holds their language-dependent representations.
      static class  Constants.Shape
      An enum for the GraphStream node shape options (see StyleConstants.Shape) that combines the language-dependent representation of each option with the keyword that must be added as an 'ui.style' attribute to a node.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String APPLICATION_NAME
      The application's name for naming the file folder for the user preferences.
      static java.awt.Color BLACK
      The color black from Swing as default foreground color of the MainFrame's status label.
      static int BUTTON_WIDTH
      The width for all JButtons in the application.
      static int COMBOBOX_INITIAL_SELECTED_INDEX
      Initial selected index for the ViewerPanel's JComboBox.
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_CSS_STYLESHEET
      The stylesheet to be added to the graph when the external resource can not be found.
      static java.lang.Double DEFAULT_EDGE_WEIGHT
      The default edge weight value for the UserPreferences when the user has not specified a value.
      static java.awt.Color DEFAULT_ERROR_COLOR
      The default color for the application's error messages.
      static java.awt.Color DEFAULT_NODE_COLOR
      The default node color to be used when the graph's stylesheet does not define one.
      static java.lang.Double DEFAULT_NODE_WEIGHT
      The default node weight value for the UserPreferences when the user has not specified a value.
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_USER_IMAGE_FILE_DIR
      The default value for the directory the user set to save the image files to.
      static java.awt.Color DEFAULT_VALID_COLOR
      The default color for the application's 'valid' message.
      static java.util.regex.Pattern DOUBLE_INPUT_PATTERN
      A Pattern to filter all illegal inputs into the node and edge weight JTextFields in the AdditionalSettingsDialog.
      static java.lang.String EXPORTED_IMAGE_FILE_EXTENSION
      The image files' extension/file format.
      static java.lang.String EXPORTED_IMAGE_FILE_NAME
      The filename of the produced image files.
      static int FRAMEWORK_GAP_SIZE
      Size for gaps between a frame's components and its bounds.
      static java.awt.Dimension GRAPHSTREAM_VIEW_PANEL_PREFERRED_SIZE
      Preferred size for the ViewerPanel's GraphStream ViewPanel.
      static int IMAGE_FILE_MIN_WIDTH_AND_HIGHT
      Minimum width and height of the written image file
      static int INTER_COMPONENT_GAP_SIZE
      Size for gaps between a frame's components.
      static boolean IS_FULL_PARTICLE_NAME_DISPLAY_DEFAULT
      The default value for UserPreferences' field specifying whether the particle names should be written out in full on the graph's nodes.
      static java.awt.Dimension LIBRARY_PANEL_SCROLLPANES_MIN_SIZE
      The minimum size of the scroll panes in the StructureLibraryPanel's JSplitPane.
      static java.lang.String LISTENER_IS_NULL
      An error message for the isListenerNull method.
      static int LOADING_TRIES
      The number of allowed times the application has got to load the user preferences and fail before the application is shut down.
      static java.lang.String MESSAGE_LABEL_INITIAL_TEXT
      Initial text for the ViewerPanel's message label and the MainFrame's status label.
      static int MESSAGE_SHOWING_TIME_MILLIS
      The time in milliseconds the ShowStatusMessageThread should wait before resetting its label's text.
      static int MIN_NODE_COUNT_FOR_UHD_4K
      Minimum node count of the graph from which on to use FileSinkImages.Resolutions.UHD_4K constant as resolution of the written image file
      static int MIN_NODE_COUNT_FOR_UHD_8K_16by9
      Minimum node count of the graph from which on to use FileSinkImages.Resolutions.UHD_8K_16by9 constant as resolution of the written image file
      static int MIN_NODE_COUNT_FOR_UHD_8K_1by1
      Minimum node count of the graph from which on to use FileSinkImages.Resolutions.UHD_8K_1by1 constant as resolution of the written image file
      static int NODE_COUNT_TO_RESOLUTION_FACTOR
      A factor the graph's node count is multiplied by to determine the resolution of the written image file
      static int NODE_SIZE_SLIDER_INITIAL_VALUE
      Initial value of the node size slider in the AdditionalSettingsDialog.
      static int NODE_SIZE_SLIDER_MAJOR_TICK_SPACING
      Major ticking space of the node size slider in the AdditionalSettingsDialog.
      static int NODE_SIZE_SLIDER_MAX
      Maximum value of the node size slider in the AdditionalSettingsDialog.
      static int NODE_SIZE_SLIDER_MIN
      Minimum value of the node size slider in the AdditionalSettingsDialog.
      static int NODE_SIZE_SLIDER_MINOR_TICK_SPACING
      Minor ticking space of the node size slider in the AdditionalSettingsDialog.
      static double REQUIRED_JAVA_VERSION
      Required java version.
      static double SPLIT_PANE_RESIZE_WEIGHT
      The resize weight for the applications split panes.
      static int TEXTAREA_INITIAL_HEIGTH
      Initial number of rows for the ViewerPanel's text area.
      static java.lang.String TEXTAREA_INITIAL_TEXT
      Initial text for the ViewerPanel's text area.
      static int TEXTAREA_INITIAL_WIDTH
      Initial number of columns for the ViewerPanel's text area.
      static int TOOL_TIP_WIDTH
      Width of all JToolTips in the application.
      static java.lang.String USER_PREFERENCES_FILENAME
      The filename of the serialized UserPreferences object.
      static java.lang.String VENDOR_NAME
      The company distributing this application's name for naming the file folder for the user preferences.
      static java.awt.Dimension VIEWER_PANEL_SPLITPANE_COMPONENTS_MIN_SIZE
      The minimum size of the ViewerPanel's components in its JSplitPane.
      static int WAITING_STEPS_FOR_IMAGE_EXPORT_BY_GRAPHATTRIBUTE
      The number of steps the ScreenshotByGraphAttributeThread should take of testing whether the image file has been produced and waiting if it has not yet been produced.
      static int WAITING_TIME_MILLIS_FOR_IMAGE_EXPORT_BY_GRAPHATTRIBUTE
      The time in milliseconds the ScreenshotByGraphAttributeThread should wait for the GraphStream viewer to produce the image file.
      static int WEIGHT_INPUT_MAX_LENGTH
      A maximum length for doubles entered into the JTextFields for edge and node weight in the AdditionalSettingsDialog.
      static int WEIGHT_TEXTFIELD_COLUMNS
      Initial number of columns for the edge weight and node weight text fields in the AdditionalSettingsDialog.
      static double ZOOM_FACTOR
      The zoom factor for ViewerPanel and AlternativeViewerPanel.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_NODE_WEIGHT

        public static final java.lang.Double DEFAULT_NODE_WEIGHT
        The default node weight value for the UserPreferences when the user has not specified a value.

        Note: There does not exist a real default value in GraphStream for this (the default here is when there is no 'layout.weight' attribute stored on the graph) so this default value is defined as Double.NaN.

      • DEFAULT_EDGE_WEIGHT

        public static final java.lang.Double DEFAULT_EDGE_WEIGHT
        The default edge weight value for the UserPreferences when the user has not specified a value.

        Note: There does not exist a real default value in GraphStream for this (the default here is when there is no 'layout.weight' attribute stored on the graph) so this default value is defined as Double.NaN.

      • GRAPHSTREAM_VIEW_PANEL_PREFERRED_SIZE

        public static final java.awt.Dimension GRAPHSTREAM_VIEW_PANEL_PREFERRED_SIZE
        Preferred size for the ViewerPanel's GraphStream ViewPanel.

      • LIBRARY_PANEL_SCROLLPANES_MIN_SIZE

        public static final java.awt.Dimension LIBRARY_PANEL_SCROLLPANES_MIN_SIZE
        The minimum size of the scroll panes in the StructureLibraryPanel's JSplitPane.

      • VIEWER_PANEL_SPLITPANE_COMPONENTS_MIN_SIZE

        public static final java.awt.Dimension VIEWER_PANEL_SPLITPANE_COMPONENTS_MIN_SIZE
        The minimum size of the ViewerPanel's components in its JSplitPane.

      • IS_FULL_PARTICLE_NAME_DISPLAY_DEFAULT

        public static final boolean IS_FULL_PARTICLE_NAME_DISPLAY_DEFAULT
        The default value for UserPreferences' field specifying whether the particle names should be written out in full on the graph's nodes.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DOUBLE_INPUT_PATTERN

        public static final java.util.regex.Pattern DOUBLE_INPUT_PATTERN
        A Pattern to filter all illegal inputs into the node and edge weight JTextFields in the AdditionalSettingsDialog.
